name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
blurb: Realistic single-player RPG set in the medieval Europe. Open-world sandbox with period accurate melee combat. Dungeons & no Dragons.

rewards.reward:
============================
PEASANT
*********************************************
Other currencies est.: $5; €3.50
*********************************************
THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING THE GAME! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
With the Peasant reward tier you are going to receive: Access to our forums + Peasant forum badge

============================
SOLDIER (digital)
*********************************************
Other currencies est.: $24; €18
********************************************* Get the digital copy of the game! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Soldier (digital) reward tier you are going to receive: Digital copy of Act I + Access to our forums + Soldier forum badge

============================
SOLDIER (physical) *********************************************
Other currencies est.: $32; €24 *********************************************
Get the game in a box! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
With the Soldier (physical) reward tier you are going to receive: Physical (boxed) copy of Act I + Access to our forums + Soldier forum badge
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add £10 for shipping.

============================
KNIGHT (digital) *********************************************
Other currencies est.: $32; €24 *********************************************
Get the digital copy and other goodies! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Knight (digital) reward tier you are going to receive: Early access to Beta + Digital copy of Act I + Download of soundtrack in MP3 + Making of Video permanent view link + Digital copy of the game manual + Access to our forums + Knight forum badge

============================
KNIGHT (special edition) *********************************************
Other currencies est.: $40; €30 *********************************************
Get the game and all the goodies in one box !
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
With the Knight (physical) reward tier you are going to receive: Early access to Beta + Physical (digipak) copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Knight forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add £10 for shipping.

============================
BARON (digital) *********************************************
Other currencies est.: $40; €30 *********************************************
Get the access to the Alpha version! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
With the Baron (digital) reward tier you are going to receive: Access to the Alpha version of the game + Digital copy of Act I + Download of soundtrack in MP3 + Download of the "Making of" video + Digital copy of the game manual + Access to our forums + Baron forum badge

============================  BARON (special edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $48; \u20ac36 ********************************************* Get the boxed game and access to Alpha! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Baron (physical) reward tier you are going to receive: Early access to Alpha version of the game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Baron forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping.

============================
VISCOUNT (digital special edition) 
*********************************************
Other currencies est.: $64; €48 
********************************************* 
All digital special edition! 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
With the Viscount reward tier you are going to receive: 
Art book in PDF + High-res digital poster + High-res digital map + Screenplay of Act I in PDF + 3D model of the Action figure suitable for 3D printing + 
Access to the Alpha version of the game + Digital copy of Act I + Download of soundtrack in MP3 + 
Download of the "Making of" video + Digital copy of the game manual + Access to our forums + Viscount forum badge

============================ EARL (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $100; \u20ac75 ********************************************* Get the collector's edition! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Earl reward tier you are going to receive: Special edition box with Art book, Poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Brass coin + Access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Earl forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping.

============================ DUKE (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $200; \u20ac150 ********************************************* Get the Act II! \r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Duke reward tier you are going to receive: Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Collector's edition \r\nwith Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Duke forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping.

============================ KING (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $480; \u20ac360 ********************************************* Get both Act II and III and original copper engraving! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the King reward tier you are going to receive: Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Act III (approx. 9 months after Act II) + Original edition Copper engraving + in-game Calvary (crucifix) memorial + Collector's edition with Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Early access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + King forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping.

============================ WENZEL der FAULE (collector's edition) ******************************************** Other currencies est.: $960; \u20ac710 ******************************************** Another chance to get the sword! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Wenzel der Faule reward tier you are going to receive: Your very own hand-forged sword with game motif + Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Act III (approx. 9 months after Act II) + Original edition Copper engraving print + your name on a conciliatory cross + Collector's edition with Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Early access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Wenzel forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping.

============================ EMPEROR (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $960; \u20ac710 ********************************************* Get your own commemorative sword! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Emperor reward tier you are going to receive: Your very own hand-forged sword with personalized inscription + Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Act III (approx. 9 months after Act II) + Original edition Copper engraving print + your portrait in an in-game church painting + Collector's edition with Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Early access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Emperor forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping.

============================ POPE (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $1,950; \u20ac1,450 ********************************************* Visit our studio and talk to Dan Vavra! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Pope reward tier you are going to receive: Opportunity to visit our studio and talk to our creative director Dan Vavra + Your very own hand-forged sword with personalized inscription + Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Act III (approx. 9 months after Act II) + Original edition Copper engraving + in-game Calvary (crucifix) memorial OR your portrait in a church painting + Collector's edition with Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Early access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Pope forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The shipping is free for backers in US and EU. Backers in the rest of the world please add \u00a310 for shipping. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The studio visit does not include the cost of travel and accommodation.

============================ ILLUMINATUS (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $4,800; \u20ac3,600 ********************************************* Get shield, sword and in-game credit! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Illuminatus reward tier you are going to receive: Opportunity to visit our studio and talk to our creative director Dan Vavra + Your name will appear in opening credits as 'Illuminatus' + Hand-painted decorative shield + Your very own hand-forged hand-and-a-half sword with personalized inscription + Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Act III (approx. 9 months after Act II) + Original edition Copper engraving + in-game Calvary (crucifix) memorial OR your portrait in a church painting + Collector's edition with Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Early access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Illuminatus forum badge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The studio visit does not include the cost of travel and accommodation.

============================ SAINT (collector's edition) ********************************************* Other currencies est.: $8,000; \u20ac6,000 ********************************************* Get a guided tour through the Middle Ages! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ With the Saint reward tier you are going to receive: Guided tour through the real-life places where Kingdom Come: Deliverance takes place + Statue with your likeness in one of the in-game churches + Opportunity to visit our studio and talk to our creative director Dan Vavra + Your name will appear in opening credits as 'Associate Producer' + Hand-painted decorative shield + Your very own hand-forged hand-and-a-half sword with personalized inscription + Act II (approx. 9 months after Act I) + Act III (approx. 9 months after Act II) + Original edition Copper engraving + Collector's edition with Art book, Action figure, Limited edition (signed) poster, T-Shirt, Dice and Commemorative Silver coin + Early access to the Alpha version of our game + Physical (digipak) as well as digital copy of Act I + Game soundtrack on CD + Making of video on DVD + Printed manual + Access to our forums + Saint forum badge  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The studio visit does not include the cost of travel and accommodation.
